name: part_009
file: tmp_【Birthdayお披露目】かわいいけどかっこいいを目指していくヴァ！！【#ときのそら生誕祭ライブ 】 [AtbVQjUesq4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora performs the song 'Kibun Joujou↑↑' on stage with Ankimo acting as a DJ.
MC section where Tokino Sora talks about her new outfit and shows it to the audience.

subtitles.original: 踊り明かしたくて回す地球儀
subtitles.english: I want to dance all night and spin the globe.

subtitles.original: Good Luck 不安定生活 それだからバランス重視
subtitles.english: Good luck with an unstable life, that's why I focus on balance.

subtitles.original: 良い事ばかりじゃないから 頑張れる
subtitles.english: It's because it's not all good things that I can do my best.

subtitles.original: 最悪な日に効く 再起動のボタンクリック
subtitles.english: Click the restart button that works on the worst days.

subtitles.original: DJ かけて今すぐ MIX
subtitles.english: DJ, play it, MIX it right now.

subtitles.original: 洒落てるビートに乗って 感じる形揺らそうよ
subtitles.english: Ride the stylish beat, let's shake the way we feel.

subtitles.original: Hey DJ カマセ Yeah Yeah Yeah 気分上々↑↑の
subtitles.english: Hey DJ, let's go! Yeah, Yeah, Yeah! My mood is soaring high!

subtitles.original: 針落とせ Party Night 止まらない
subtitles.english: Drop the needle, Party Night, it won't stop.

subtitles.original: Roll-ly, Roll-ly, Roll-ly みんなで踊れ
subtitles.english: Roll-ly, Roll-ly, Roll-ly, everyone dance!

subtitles.original: Hip Hop Pop かけてよ ミラーボール・ナンバー
subtitles.english: Play Hip Hop Pop, that Mirror Ball Number.

subtitles.original: 新衣装ー！Hey!
subtitles.english: New outfit! Hey!

subtitles.original: 新衣装ー！Hey!
subtitles.english: New outfit! Hey!

subtitles.original: 青・白！Hey!
subtitles.english: Blue and white! Hey!

subtitles.original: 青・白！
subtitles.english: Blue and white!

subtitles.original: Hip Hop Pop はずむは 鼓動の果て
subtitles.english: Hip Hop Pop, bouncing to the end of the heartbeat.

subtitles.original: 十字路で 今を楽しみたいね
subtitles.english: At the crossroads, I want to enjoy the moment.

subtitles.original: リズム探して 良いポイント それぞれの色重ね合わそ
subtitles.english: Looking for the rhythm, the good point, let's layer our respective colors.

subtitles.original: 君と手と手重ねて 苦しむ筈の果て
subtitles.english: With your hand in mine, at the end where we were supposed to suffer,

subtitles.original: 十字路で 今を楽しみたいね
subtitles.english: At the crossroads, I want to enjoy the moment.

subtitles.original: Let's Party はじけるわ
subtitles.english: Let's Party, it's popping!

subtitles.original: 洒落てるフローに乗って 頭の中揺さぶる
subtitles.english: Ride the stylish flow, shaking inside your head.

subtitles.original: Hey DJ 洒落て Yeah Yeah Yeah 気分上々↑↑の
subtitles.english: Hey DJ, stylish, Yeah, Yeah, Yeah! My mood is soaring high!

subtitles.original: 波に乗って 弾け飛べ Party Night
subtitles.english: Ride the wave, pop off, Party Night!

subtitles.original: Roll-ly, Roll-ly, Roll-ly みんなで踊れ
subtitles.english: Roll-ly, Roll-ly, Roll-ly, everyone dance!

subtitles.original: Hip Hop Pop 朝まで ミラーボール・ナンバー
subtitles.english: Play Hip Hop Pop, until morning, Mirror Ball Number.

subtitles.original: ミラーボール スモークの匂い
subtitles.english: Mirror ball, the smell of smoke,

subtitles.original: 溶けるようなハーモニー
subtitles.english: like a melting harmony.

subtitles.original: 身にまとって 踊り明かす がむしゃらなままで
subtitles.english: Wrap it around yourself and dance all night, staying reckless.

subtitles.english: Roll-ly, Roll-ly, Roll-ly

subtitles.original: Hey DJ カマセ Yeah Yeah Yeah
subtitles.english: Hey DJ, let's go! Yeah, Yeah, Yeah!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、気分上々でした！
subtitles.english: Yes! And that was 'Kibun Joujou'!

subtitles.original: そして、新衣装だ！やったよー、あんきも。新衣装が来た！
subtitles.english: And it's a new outfit! We did it, Ankimo. A new outfit has arrived!

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: というわけで、はい。あのね、昨日の配信でも...
subtitles.english: So, yes. You know, in yesterday's stream too...

subtitles.original: えー、いろいろと予想があって、すごい似てる人が多くてびっくりしちゃいましたね。
subtitles.english: um, there were various predictions, and I was surprised by how many people guessed correctly.

subtitles.original: やっぱこういう衣装がみんな良かったのかなっていう感じで。
subtitles.english: I guess everyone liked this kind of outfit.

subtitles.original: はい、早速ね、ちょっとずつ見せていこうかなって思います。
subtitles.english: Yes, I'd like to show it to you bit by bit right away.

subtitles.original: まず下側ですね。見て、ブーツ。
subtitles.english: First, the bottom half. Look, the boots.

subtitles.original: ブーツ、ブーツに私のモチーフの星が入ってます。
subtitles.english: The boots, there are stars, my motif, on the boots.

subtitles.original: そしてね、レースですね。
subtitles.english: And then, the lace.

subtitles.original: こちら、レースの靴下。
subtitles.english: Here, lace socks.

subtitles.original: めっちゃ可愛い、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: They're so cute, thank you!

subtitles.original: そして、ちょっとね、足がいっぱい見えんの恥ずかしいんですけど、
subtitles.english: And, it's a bit embarrassing to show so much of my legs, but,

subtitles.original: からの、こちら、パンツスタイル。
subtitles.english: following that, here's the pants style.

subtitles.original: からの、ほら！ロゴのね、この色っていうのが、あちこちに使われております。
subtitles.english: And, look! This color from the logo is used here and there.

subtitles.original: ね？
subtitles.english: Right?

subtitles.original: そして、実はこの胸元のパーカーなんですけど、
subtitles.english: And, actually, about this hoodie around the chest area,

subtitles.original: 胸元のところには、えー、あんきもとぬんぬんのなんか何これ？
subtitles.english: on the chest part, um, there's Ankimo and Nun-Nun's... what is this?

subtitles.original: お団子みたいにあって、で、ぬんぬんって書いてあります。
subtitles.english: They're like dumplings, and it says 'Nun-Nun'.

subtitles.original: からの、ネックレスとチョーカーをつけました。
subtitles.english: Also, I put on a necklace and a choker.

subtitles.original: ぬふっ。
subtitles.english: Hehe.

subtitles.original: そして、上は帽子ですね。
subtitles.english: And, on top is a hat.

subtitles.original: こっち、こっちか。
subtitles.english: This side, this way.
